timeline.message: change variable name to have List
split Liquibase change to another PR

timeline.bodyText: If it is null, I assume this returns null? It should probably return an empty list.
timeline.author: s-rubenstein

timeline.bodyText:
There is a null check here: https://github.com/all-of-us/workbench/pull/3109/files#diff-e5967f0cb03794422311275e49891c41R74
but this doesn't have one, so it could null pointer error. Could you add a null check to this?
timeline.author: s-rubenstein

replies.bodyText: it will be an empty HashSet in case purpose.getDisseminateResearchFindingList() is NULL L175
replies.author: NehaBroad

timeline.bodyText: Same thing where if this can return null, then this could null pointer error, and if it can't, then we don't need the null check above. (I think it could probably return an empty set rather than null)
timeline.author: s-rubenstein

timeline.bodyText: Are these tests added to the test suite?
timeline.author: s-rubenstein

replies.bodyText: The test compare the object return from the saved/clones vs whats store in the Database, so if the value of either one of them is incorrect or not set it fails. I am however not checking the individual parameter
replies.author: NehaBroad
